card_name: Giltia the D. Knight - Soul Spear
card_text: If you control no monsters, you can Normal Summon this card without Tributing. When this card is Normal Summoned: You can banish 1 monster your opponent controls with equal or higher ATK than this card. You can discard 1 card; add 1 of the following monsters from your Deck to your hand.$N●Level 7 DARK Dragon$N●Level 6 DARK Machine$N●Level 5 WATER Warrior$NYou can only use this effect of "Giltia the D. Knight - Soul Spear" once per turn.
